content: add a touch of cozy halloween charm to your favorite fall drink the pumpkin cup cozy is a free crochet pattern a quick and fun project perfect for autumn markets last-minute gifts or festive décor this easy textured design works up fast and uses a small amount of yarn ideal for stash-busting and who love seasonal projects the pdf file includes detailed written instructions a symbol chart / diagram for visual crocheters a full step-by-step photo tutorial for special stitches is available on my website olhabykovacrocheting blog make it in classic pumpkin orange warm neutrals or experiment with your favorite fall color palette it s a perfect handmade touch for halloween cozy evenings or autumn gifts
